title: Sales and Negotiation Officer
job_overview:
To apply, please submit a 2-minute video recording introducing yourself to Upgrade to see actual info (applicants with no video recording will not be considered).

BUILD YOUR CAREER HERE AT PROLIANCE!
Help local communities and neighborhoods with their storm restoration claims.

The Approval Specialist are in demand for all types of insurance companies and this is the best time to start. Earn a great starting salary and lots of room to advance quickly.

If you see yourself working independently, meeting and helping different people and you have a knack for sales - this job is for you. Become part of our esteemed approval department and have a key role in helping our clients' claims get approved.

Requirements:
>Genuinely enjoys connecting with people
>Persuasive
>Detail-oriented
>Calm and collected during difficult negotiation talks
>Enjoys gathering details
>Loves working independently

Responsibilities:
>Help homeowners fight for the insurance coverage they deserve by turning denied or partial claims into full approvals.
>Negotiate with insurance adjusters to secure reinspection for denied claims.
>Provide clear, professional guidance to homeowners, ensuring they understand and approve the reinspection process.

Compensation: 
$7 - $8 per hour + performance bonus 

To apply, please submit your CV and a 2-minute video recording introducing yourself to Upgrade to see actual info
